Trivia: Kevin Costner was originally cast as Jack Ryan. 24 years later, he played Thomas Harper in the reboot Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit (2014). See more »
Goofs: There is a scene in which a Russian official mentions the "Barents Sea" and points to the proper place on a map (the Barents sea is north of Finland and Russia). However the closed caption incorrectly reads "Bering Sea." The Bering sea is between Russia and Alaska. None of the ships in the movie are anywhere near the Bering sea. See more »
Crazy_Credits: Stanley (Sally Ryan's stuffed bear) is credited as "Himself" See more »

Plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war? Soviets create a new nuclear submarine that runs silent due to a revolutionary propulsion system. Russian sub captain defects, goal of taking it to the U.S.A. to prevent the Russians from using the sub to wreak nuclear (missile) war against the U.S. Lots of plot turns and twists in this high-tech thriller.
